text:
Sandfield's a software company
here in Auckland.
We've got about 130 people working here.

Our key areas of focus are really around
supply chain,
EDI integration services,
as well as financial management systems.
We develop software.

A lot of it's around
tracking of containers, and trucks,

and transport management systems
in that area.

Where we specialize, is building things
where customers can get something
that's really tailored to them.
Before AWS, we had a local provider,

and we had about 10 customers
on our cloud-based platform.

That was quite a lot of work in
keeping that running.

We moved that to AWS, and we've been able
to scale that right up.

Now we've got 150 customers
running on there.
It's working really well for us.
With AWS, we can easily provision

new solutions from templates
or as code, enabling us

to deliver these much quicker
and with more accuracy and consistency.

For our customers, this means more
repeatable and accurate deployments.

We work a lot with the AWS team
here in New Zealand.
They're based in Auckland.
They've been really good for us.

They'll come up to our office,
give us some training sessions on the AWS products available.

A lot of SMBs
have made the journey and migrated to AWS.

The important thing to us
is that there's a really good community.
There's good support.
There's plenty of resources
to get you underway.
